results.content:
It's a good intro and overview for beginners. 
I snoozed comfortably during the practical part; which is a bit outdated but still good enough to start with.
For the the look over the plate part, I just miss a summary markup document, in the course-materials. This is the reason I gave only 4 instead of 5!

results.content:
The course is overall good. But instructor used existing API's of twitter and facebook and where he reused the methods from the same. It will be more attractive if he can create an application on his own and reuse them. 
But this is very good platform to learn basics of node.js
Thanks for information

results.content:
In this course existing code is used to roughly explain what it does and what its meant for. The course description doesn't reflect the way the course is made as also how the content is presented. 

If you want to get a high level overview about the topics this course covers you can give it a try.

results.content: There is no live coding, just a tonne of code already written and the instructor simply talks about it
